# Bara að gera setup ef það þarf
if(!exists("dt.RE_data")){ source("setUp.R")}
source("utilz.R")

#ggpairs(dt.RE_data)
lm1 <- lm(nuvirdi ~ ., data = dt.RE_data)
summary(lm1)
slm1 <- step(lm1)
summary(slm1)
slm1$anova

n<-dim(dt.RE_data)[1]

# Training and testing data sets
set.seed(5)
rows<-sample(1:n,n/3)
train <- makeSubSet(dt.RE_data, -rows)
test <- makeSubSet(dt.RE_data, rows)

kdagur <- train$kdagur         
nuvirdi <- train$nuvirdi        
teg_eign <- as.factor(train$teg_eign)      
byggar <- train$byggar         
haednr <- train$haednr        
lyfta <- train$lyfta       
ibm2  <- train$ibm2         
fjhaed <- train$fjhaed    
fjbilast  <- train$fjbilast    
fjbkar  <- train$fjbkar
fjsturt <- train$fjsturt
fjklos  <- train$fjklos 
fjeld  <- train$fjeld    
fjherb  <- train$fjherb
fjstof  <- train$fjstof    
fjgeym  <- train$fjgeym     
stig10  <- train$stig10   
ibteg <- as.factor(train$ibteg) 

lm.all <- lm(nuvirdi ~ teg_eign + byggar + haednr + lyfta + ibm2 + fjhaed + fjbilast + fjbkar + fjsturt + fjklos + fjeld + fjherb + fjstof + fjgeym + stig10 + ibteg, data = train)

summary(lm.all)
